description:
When Shiro wakes up, Sora is gone.  It`s as if he never existed, and he`s vanished from Shiro`s smartphone and Steph and Jibril`s memories.  She knows he`s real, but everything around her says otherwise.  Jibril begins to suspect that she lost a game and has had false memories implanted.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 解離法[スカイ・ウォーク]
